name: Hecarim
title: the Shadow of War
lore: Hecarim is a spectral fusion of man and beast, cursed to ride down the souls of the living for all eternity. When the Blessed Isles fell into shadow, this proud knight was obliterated by the destructive energies of the Ruination, along with all his cavalry and their mounts. Now, whenever the Black Mist reaches out across Runeterra, he leads their devastating charge, reveling in the slaughter and crushing the foe beneath his armored hooves.
blurb: Hecarim is a spectral fusion of man and beast, cursed to ride down the souls of the living for all eternity. When the Blessed Isles fell into shadow, this proud knight was obliterated by the destructive energies of the Ruination, along with all his...
allytips: Spirit of Dread restores Health when nearby enemies take damage, including damage dealt by allies. Cast this during a large fight to maximize Hecarim's survivability.
Devastating Charge deals more damage based on the distance traveled. Try using Onslaught of Shadows or Summoner Spells such as Ghost or Flash to maximize this damage.
enemytips: Hecarim gains life from nearby enemies with Spirit of Dread but lacks durability, use burst damage.
Hecarim's ultimate causes opponents to flee in terror. Spread out to reduce his power in fights.

riot_spell_q.name: Rampage
riot_spell_q.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ basedamage }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ miniondamageratio*100 }}% damage to minions)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ rampagecooldownreduction }} second and increasing its damage by {{ rampagebonusratio*100 }}% for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ maxstacks }} times.

riot_spell_w.name: Spirit of Dread
riot_spell_w.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.

riot_spell_e.name: Devastating Charge
riot_spell_e.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).

Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.

riot_spell_r.name: Onslaught of Shadows
riot_spell_r.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ basedamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Hecarim releases a shockwave at the end of his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for {{ feardurationmin }} to {{ feardurationmax }} seconds (increases by charge distance).

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

riot_spell_i.name: Warpath
riot_spell_i.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Warpath
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus movement speed.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Hecarim''' gains {{as|{{pp|7|key=%|15 to 30|1;3 to 18|formula=15%+2.5% every 3 levels starting from level 3}} of his '''bonus''' {{sti|[[movement speed]]}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* ''Warpath's'' bonus attack damage will adjust itself to any temporary movement speed (de)buffs ''Hecarim'' is affected by ({{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}, {{ai|Song of Celerity|Sona}}, {{si|Ghost}}, {{ii|Randuin's Omen}}, {{ai|Wither|Nasus}}).
** Since this only affects bonus values ''Hecarim'' will not dip below his regular attack damage if he is slowed below his base movement speed.
* The amount of bonus attack damage granted is checked every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Rampage
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' cleaves nearby enemies, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, reduced to {{fd|66.{{recurring|6}}}}% against [[minion]]s.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 215}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion damage|{{ap|55*2/3 to 215*2/3|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|46.{{recurring|6}}}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If '''Hecarim''' damages at least one enemy with ''Rampage'', its '''base''' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second and the damage is increased by 5% for 8 seconds, stacking up to twice.
wikia_skill_q1.notes: * ''Rampage'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Hecarim's'' previous orders.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Spirit of Dread
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' surrounds himself with the spirit of dread for 4 seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} per second to all enemies within its reach.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*4 to 60*4}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: While ''Spirit of Dread'' is active, '''Hecarim''' is {{tip|heal|healed}} for 30% of the damage taken by enemies from any source within the area, capped from [[minion]]s and monsters.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Spirit of Dread'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Hecarim's'' previous orders.
** The only restriction ''Spirit of Dread'' has for healing ''Hecarim'' is that the source must not be an enemy (damage from neutral monsters will count) and that enemies spending their own health to use abilities will not count.
* The healing cap against minions accounts for every single one regardless of how many are present and/or affected by ''Spirit of Dread'' at the time of cast.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Devastating Charge
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' is temporarily {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 4 seconds, beginning at 25% and increasing to 75% over 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: While '''Hecarim''' is charging, his next [[basic attack]] gains {{pp|9|type=distance traveled|50 to 250|0 to 1200}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} and causes him to {{tip|dash}} to his target, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} {{pp|9|type=distance traveled|250 to 450|0 to 1200}} units and dealing {{as|modified physical damage}}, up to double the amount based on distance traveled, ending its effects in the process.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|45*2 to 165*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Devastating Charge'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Hecarim's'' previous orders.
* '''Hecarim's''' basic attack timer is reset on cast.
* The cooldown begins on cast and not when the bonus movement speed expires.
* The bonus movement speed stacks multiplicatively.
* The basic attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the modified damage cannot).
* ''Devastating Charge's'' damage will apply [[life steal]] and will affect structures.
* ''Devastating Charge's'' will not go through {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}}, or {{tip|blind}} but the knockback will still be applied.
* Once '''Hecarim''' starts dashing towards the enemy, the attack will be unstoppable and will hit the target even if '''Hecarim''' is stopped (i.e {{cai|Event Horizon|Veigar}}).
* '''Hecarim''' cannot dash if he's {{tip|root|rooted}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Onslaught of Shadows
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' summons spectral riders and {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction with them {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in their path.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Enemies within range of where '''Hecarim''' stops are also made to {{tip|flee}} from him for {{pp|2|type=distance traveled|0.75;1.5|0;1000|changedisplay=true}} seconds, also gradually {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by up to 99% over the duration. ''This slow cannot be reduced.''
wikia_skill_r1.description3: The wave of spectral riders travels through ''Onslaught of Shadows's'' full length, regardless of where '''Hecarim''' himself stops.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * The flee will only be applied to enemies on an area where '''Hecarim''' lands, so it's possible for someone to get hit by ''Onslaught of Shadows's'' without getting {{tip|fear|feared}}.
